item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, September 5, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Volvo Cars ditches pledge to sell only electric cars by 2030
2. Harris proposes 28% top capital gains tax rate in softening of Biden’s plan
3. Patel out of Tory leadership contest as Jenrick tops first poll
4. Russia built covert trade channel with India, leaks reveal
5. Putin’s flagship Arctic gas project struggles to lure customers
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, September 5, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
